body_html:
@brightnesss Okey, I guess nn.Linear should probably serve your application. It calls addmm(Sparse, Dense) and matmul(Sparse, Dense). These two ops are already implemented, we will need to support autograd.

EDIT: will need to use 1st dim of sparse input as batch_dim
body_text:
@brightnesss Okey,  I guess nn.Linear should probably serve your application. It calls addmm(Sparse, Dense) and matmul(Sparse, Dense). These two ops are already implemented, we will need to support autograd.
EDIT: will need to use 1st dim of sparse input as batch_dim
body:
@brightnesss Okey,  I guess `nn.Linear` should probably serve your application. It calls `addmm(Sparse, Dense)` and `matmul(Sparse, Dense)`. These two ops are already implemented, we will need to support autograd.

~~EDIT: will need to use 1st dim of sparse input as `batch_dim`~~
